turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, pick up at which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Mulberry Plaza in Upland at 1013 W Foothill Blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. What did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced coffee with milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take 2% milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any add ins?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't think so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about sweetener?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll take sweetener.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'm going to read everything back to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've got a grande iced coffee with 2%milk, sweetened.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your drink is on order and will be ready for pickup at the Upland Starbucks on Foothill blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
